name: Simple Columnizer
author: Muhammad Babar

sections.description: Simple columnizer create “Widget Area” with name “Columnizer Widget Area” in admin section with Drag & Drop “Columnizer” widget. You can generate number of columns. Place short code where you want. Short code available to you after save the widget.
sections.installation:
1. Upload simple-columnizer to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

How add new classes?

“Custom Classes” => array(
‘col-lg-1’,
‘col-lg-2’
)
);

add in functions.php or in plugin file.
